meanings.definition: Relating to or used for the monthly payment of wages or salary.
meanings.sent1: The company provides a mensal salary to its employees every month.
meanings.sent2: She received her mensal paycheck on the last day of the month.
meanings.sent3: The mensal payment arrived just in time for her to pay her bills.
meanings.sent4: His mensal income was crucial for supporting his family.
meanings.sent5: The concept of mensal wages helped her budget effectively.

meanings.definition: A table or altar used for the celebration of the Eucharist.
meanings.sent1: The priest placed the chalice on the mensal before starting the service.
meanings.sent2: The church's mensal was beautifully decorated for the special ceremony.
meanings.sent3: During the service, the cat accidentally jumped onto the mensal.
meanings.sent4: The light from the candles flickered on the mensal, creating a serene atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The golden cross on the mensal gleamed in the sunlight.
